item.description:
Sunday, August 26

Join us for a picnic on the beach on Spectacle Island, one of Boston?s Harbor Islands. While there, enjoy a live concert of Dixie, Swing and Jazz music, take a guided tour of the island or take advantage of the 5 miles of walking trails, with panoramic views of the harbor and city. The island is equipped with a caf√© and public restrooms.
Bring: bathing suit and towel, sunscreen and bug repellant, water and a picnic lunch. We?ll take the water shuttle out to the island together. Directions and parking information for the Water Shuttle can be found on http://www.bostonisla....
RSVP: Preferred by Friday, August 23 (w/phone number/email included). Inclement weather cancels.
MEET: 10:30 AM at Starbucks in the lobby of the Marriott-Long Wharf hotel.
COST: Water shuttle costs $12 round trip + cost of lunch if purchased on island, and an additional $5 for non-members.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: PICNIC ON BOSTON HARBOR ISLAND
